actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to establish the Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.

summary.text: Establishes the Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in Massachusetts. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish a planning commission for such Area. Enumerates criteria upon which the Secretary is to approve or disapprove the Commission's plan. Authorizes the Secretary to make grants totaling $20,000,000 to state and local units of government having responsibility for implementing the final approved plan. Establishes a special account in the Treasury of the United States to hold monies to be used for such grants.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.
